summary: Anna, a French actress, is approached by financial broker Gordon in the Vermeer room of a New York gallery. However, romance does not ensue...
cast: Emmanuelle Chaulet|Katie Garner|Grace Phillips|Laurel Lee Kiefer|Gracie Mansion|Gordon Joseph Weiss|Stephen Lack|Roger Ruffin
keywords: actress|world trade center manhattan new york city|wall street manhattan new york city|metropolitan museum of art manhattan new york city|manhattan new york city
title: All the Vermeers in New York
